Python 3.11.2 (tags/v3.11.2:878ead1, Feb  7 2023, 16:38:35) [MSC v.1934 64 bit (AMD64)] on win32
Type "help", "copyright", "credits" or "license()" for more information.
A = [[3,-0.1,-0.2,7.85],[0.1,7,-0.3,-19.3],[0.3,-0.2,10,71.4]]
A = [[3,-0.1,-0.2],[0.1,7,-0.3],[0.3,-0.2,10]]
B =[7.85,-19.3,71.4]
x1,x2, x3=0,0,0
x1a=lambda x2,x3:(B[0]-A[0][1]*x2-A[0][2]*x3)/A[0][0]
x2a=lambda x1,x3:(B[1]-A[1][0]*x1-A[1][2]*x3)/A[1][1]
x3a=lambda x1,x2:(B[2]-A[2][0]*x1-A[2][1]*x2)/A[2][2]
while True:
    x1n = x1a(x2,x3)
    x2n = x2a(x1,x3)
    x3n = x3a(x1,x2)
    print(x1n, x2n, x3n)
    if abs((x1n-x1)/x1)<1e-4:break
    x1,x2,x3 = x1n, x2n, x3n
#end-while

    
2.6166666666666667 -2.757142857142857 7.140000000000001
Traceback (most recent call last):
  File "<pyshell#14>", line 6, in <module>
    if abs((x1n-x1)/x1)<1e-4:break
ZeroDivisionError: float division by zero
while True:
    x1n = x1a(x2,x3)
    x2n = x2a(x1,x3)
    x3n = x3a(x1,x2)
    print(x1n, x2n, x3n)
    if x1 != 0 and abs((x1n-x1)/x1)<1e-4:break
    x1,x2,x3 = x1n, x2n, x3n
#end-while

    print(x1n, x2n, x3n)
    if x1 != 0 and abs((x1n-x1)/x1)<1e-8:break
    x1,x2,x3 = x1n, x2n, x3n
#end-while

#iterasi gauss seidel
x1,x2,x3=0,0,0
while True:
    x1p=x1
    x1 = x1a(x2,x3)
    x2 = x2a(x1,x3)
    x3 = x3a(x1,x2)
    print(x1, x2, x3)
    if x1 != 0 and abs((x1p-x1)/x1)<1e-8:break
#end-while

2.9999999999880793 -2.4999999999977205 7.000000000000403
x1,x2,x3=0,0,0
A = [[1,-1,2],[3,0,1],[1,0,2]]
B = [5,10,5]
x1,x2,x3=0,0,0
while True:
    x1p=x1
    x1 = x1a(x2,x3)
    x2 = x2a(x1,x3)
    x3 = x3a(x1,x2)
    print(x1, x2, x3)
    if x1 != 0 and abs((x1p-x1)/x1)<1e-8:break
#end-while

    x2a=lambda x1,x3:(B[1]-A[1][0]*x1-A[1][2]*x3)/A[1][1]
ZeroDivisionError: float division by zero

B = [5,10,5]
A = [[1,-1,2],[3,0,1],[1,0,2]]
C = [[1,-1,2,5],[3,0,1,10],[1,0,2,5]]
gauss(C)

B = [5,10,5]
x1,x2,x3=0,0,0
while True:
    x1p=x1
    x1 = x1a(x2,x3)
    x2 = x2a(x1,x3)
    x3 = x3a(x1,x2)
    print(x1, x2, x3)
    if x1 != 0 and abs((x1p-x1)/x1)<1e-8:break
#end-while

x1a=lambda x2,x3:(B[0]-A[0][1]*x2-A[0][2]*x3)/A[0][0]
x2a=lambda x1,x3:(B[1]-A[1][0]*x1-A[1][2]*x3)/A[1][1]
x3a=lambda x1,x2:(B[2]-A[2][0]*x1-A[2][1]*x2)/A[2][2]
